attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's expenses have been abused for too long and must be stopped. I purpose that MP's should get the same wage as they currently get without the ludicrous  perks they have been exploiting. We the general public have had enough and it's time for all MP's to get their noses out of the trough and live in the real world as they expect us to do. Brown's attendance allowance should NOT be accepted as this would give MP's a larger slice of taxpayers cash.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
